stageList.title: Control Team Containment
stageList.desc: The first impression of the Lobotomy Corporation branch facility was downright gruesome. Rendered speechless, we stared into the corpses of people with insectile features.

stageList.title: Control Team Containment
stageList.desc: The first impression of the Lobotomy Corporation branch facility was downright gruesome. Rendered speechless, we stared into the corpses of people with insectile features.

stageList.title: Control Team Lobby
stageList.desc: The first impression of the Lobotomy Corporation branch facility was downright gruesome. Rendered speechless, we stared into the corpses of people with insectile features.

stageList.title: Employee Waiting Room
stageList.desc: In the dusky corridor, a shadow appears. It watches us carefully approach. It was clear that we were not going to be a welcome presence to each other.

stageList.title: Defense Line 23-7 - 1100 Hours
stageList.desc: A swarm of maggots were the first thing we saw on the next floor. Then, with a golden flash, we're greeted by a blurry sky, ringing with sounds of cannons and shouts. Gregor's unstable voice let me know that this was a battlefield.

stageList.title: Defense Line 23-7 - 1100 Hours
stageList.desc: A swarm of maggots were the first thing we saw on the next floor. Then, with a golden flash, we're greeted by a blurry sky, ringing with sounds of cannons and shouts. Gregor's unstable voice let me know that this was a battlefield.

stageList.title: Defense Line 23-7 - 1100 Hours
stageList.desc: A swarm of maggots were the first thing we saw on the next floor. Then, with a golden flash, we're greeted by a blurry sky, ringing with sounds of cannons and shouts. Gregor's unstable voice let me know that this was a battlefield.

stageList.title: Defense Line 23-7 - 1300 Hours
stageList.desc: Tomah the youthful soldier greets us as though this is his first time seeing us, and our surroundings are making less and less sense. Is this how Gregor viewed his past?

stageList.title: Containment Hall 1
stageList.desc: We were perplexed by the encounter with creatures that resembled Abnormalities at first glance. Yuri seemed just as confused as the rest of us.

stageList.title: Containment Hall 2
stageList.desc: Continued battles wounded and fatigued the Sinners. It was about time I winded my clock. Faust looks around for the right spot for me to do my thing.

stageList.title: Containment Hall 2
stageList.desc: Continued battles wounded and fatigued the Sinners. It was about time I winded my clock. Faust looks around for the right spot for me to do my thing.

stageList.title: Employee Lounge
stageList.desc: Continued battles wounded and fatigued the Sinners. It was about time I winded my clock. Faust looks around for the right spot for me to do my thing.

stageList.title: Defense Line 23-7 - 1300 Hours
stageList.desc: Tomah the youthful soldier greets us as though this is his first time seeing us, and our surroundings are making less and less sense. Is this how Gregor viewed his past?

stageList.title: Containment Hall 4
stageList.desc: In the dusky corridor, a shadow appears. It watches us carefully approach. It was clear that we were not going to be a welcome presence to each other.

stageList.title: Containment Hall 5
stageList.desc: Leaving aside the warning Gregor's old boss gave, we moved on. An acrid smell began to fill the air as if to punish our foolishness.

stageList.title: Canteen
stageList.desc: We faced the Abnormality that most likely caused many disasters in the facility. According to Yuri, these Abnormalities used to be under strict supervision, kept in check by detailed managerial procedures. I didn't want to imagine what happened since the facility faced closure.

stageList.title: Cafeteria
stageList.desc: We faced the Abnormality that most likely caused many disasters in the facility. According to Yuri, these Abnormalities used to be under strict supervision, kept in check by detailed managerial procedures. I didn't want to imagine what happened since the facility faced closure.

stageList.title: Info. Team Passage
stageList.desc: The clock restored all Sinners to health, but the facility continues to grow more foreboding. Hoping that I was only imagining the spikes covering the aisles bristle up, we proceeded farther.

stageList.title: Critical Abno. Containment Block
stageList.desc: We faced the Abnormality that most likely caused many disasters in the facility. According to Yuri, these Abnormalities used to be under strict supervision, kept in check by detailed managerial procedures. I didn't want to imagine what happened since the facility faced closure.

stageList.title: Defense Line 23-7 - 1536 Hours
stageList.desc: The massive hand from Gregor's memories took us back to the containment unit. Getting out of the battleground doesn't mean the end of the war, however; the Golden Bough is still waiting to be claimed.

stageList.title: Defense Line 23-7 - 1300 Hours
stageList.desc: Tomah the youthful soldier greets us as though this is his first time seeing us, and our surroundings are making less and less sense. Is this how Gregor viewed his past?

stageList.desc: Tomah the youthful soldier greets us as though this is his first time seeing us, and our surroundings are making less and less sense. Is this how Gregor viewed his past?

stageList.title: Defense Line 23-7 - 1536 Hours
stageList.desc: Tomah the youthful soldier greets us as though this is his first time seeing us, and our surroundings are making less and less sense. Is this how Gregor viewed his past?

stageList.title: Defense Line 23-7 - 1300 Hours
stageList.desc: In the battlefield, we fight soldiers with body parts of insects just like Gregor. I couldn't tell where this was or who they were, but I got the feeling that this was a product of the Golden Bough's influence.
